original: 啟稟大人，屬下已遣人對<color=#fff999>$country1</color>使用借刀殺人計謀，卻遭到<color=#fff999>$country1</color>拒絕！(<color=#bceea7>借刀殺人 失敗</color>)
text: Enlightenment, your subordinates have sent someone to use a borrowed knife to kill <color=#fff999>$country1</color>, but <color=#fff999>$country1</color> refused! (<color=#bceea7>Failed to kill with a knife</color>)
